title: Kira Kira 5th Anniversary Live Anime: Kick Start Generation
alternative_title: キラ☆キラ 5th Anniversary Live Anime KICK START GENERATION
description: Based on the visual novel by Overdrive. The what-if story reunites the Second Literature Club Band members Kirari, Chie, Shikanosuke, and Sarina, several months after the concert in the d2b vs Deardrops ~Cross the Future~ fan disk.
